Row.Text: Whoa, those are some fancy clothes you're wearing! I'm guessing you're not just here to buy toys or get Umika's autograph! My name's Kazumi...just Kazumi! And we're the Pleiades Saints, the biggest and best collective of Magical Girls in the world! Let's hope we can work together!

How terrible...the Pleiades Saints are ruined! You monster, how could you do this to us?! Do you know what's going to happen to all of the girls in our Freezer now?! You've sealed the fates of Magical Girls all over the planet! I hope you're happy with yourself!
Oh, hey! Umika is pretty pissy right now and went on a cooking spree. So we've got plenty of spare food for you to eat!
Good to see you again! I think I remembered to form all of my clothes when I transformed this time!
What's up? Care to buy a bear?
Bibbidy-bobbidy-boo, and a hello to you! Hehe, that was a little cringeworthy, wasn't it?
Hey-o!
Haven't we banned you from the store? You need to get out of here, now.
No, I'm not going to quit pointing my staff at you. So just be careful what you say.
I'm not scared of you. Pleaides Saints, it's time for us to fight!
Jeez, this is not going to be easy. But I know if we all stick together, we'll beat you no matter what kind of advantage you have!
Oh, man. You've just made a bigger mistake than tugging on Umika's horns when she's mad.
You know, that's okay with us! We've got some pent-up stress we've gotta let out, what with all our personal problems and troubled pasts!
That's...not good news to hear, that an army of your size is declaring war! Well, if worse comes to worse, I'll just blast your armies myself with Limiti Esterni to even the odds!
Man, I think one of us could beat you by yourself. But hey, it's your decision if you wanna come fight us and lose horribly!

Not only am I about to tell the world how terrible you are, but I'm banning you from shopping at Angelica Bears! Oh, and no more book signings from Umika, either![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
The nerve of you! You do NOT insult my ahoge!
Our people are now buying your blue jeans and listening to your pop music.[NEWLINE]Hey, if I wear blue jeans when I transform, I'll never have to worry about forgetting my skirt again, right?
I think Kaoru needs room for more soccer fields. Let's plow down your cities and build them there!
We're here to protect the world from Witches and save Magical Girls. In this case, it looks like to do that, we're gonna have to take you down!
You're in the way of our plans to cleanse the world of the Incubators' system. Don't worry, this is for the good of Magical Girls everywhere. Your sacrifice won't be in vain!
Were we friends? I'm sorry, I must have had amnesia. Kinda common thing for me, that old amnesia. But I think maybe you're misremembering...we're not friends, we're enemies!
This ended up being a better contract than...well, you know. So, wanna do it again?
Great!
Sweet!
Holy guacamole! That's a super-duper deal, thanks!
Thanks a million!
I'm so glad to hear that!
Alright, you're kinda getting on my nerves!
Our prices are fixed. Angelica Bears isn't some open market!
So, ready to surrender? Or do you need another laser beam to the face to convince you?
Ouch...my ahoge went limp...guess that's a good of a sign as any that we should just call it quits, huh?
Could we please agree to stop the fighting?
I'm not going to lose to you, so get ready!
Let's call it a truce...and if this isn't enough, I'm sure I could cook you some strawberry risotto too...
You know Umika, always a cheapskate. She refuses to sign off on this deal again without more from your end, so...
We *could* afford that, but our finances are being handled by one heck of a miserly girl. Sorry!
How's about this sweet deal?
Gotta reject that one, I'm afraid!
With you and me working together, {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} should surrender quite soon!

Your military forces make the Saints look like a bunch of amateurs...ugh, we're gonna have to work harder to bolster our numbers. Maybe we should do some sort of idol singing performance for recruitment. Too cliche?
With that much money, I wouldn't be surprised if you're looking to do a hostile buyout of Angelica Bears. Please tell me you're not!
It's no surprise that someone like you is off fighting a war somewhere.
Here, let me give you a spell to help you out in that war! Abracadabra, alakazam, I'll help you win with soldier spam![NEWLINE]...c'mon, I'm sure it'll work!

Hey, whaddaya say the Pleiades Saints and your great country join forces? The benefits are immense! You get a discount on all our bears (well, except special editions), me and Umika can cook for you...
Sure! We've even got a sale going!
Right, right! What do you wanna trade?
